properties.name: MergeType
properties.description: Configuration of the merged behavior for the association. For example when it could be auto or has to be manual.

type.description: Configuration of the merged behavior for the association. For example when it could be auto or has to be manual.

properties.name: MergedApiIdentifier
properties.description: Identifier of the Merged GraphQLApi to associate. It could be either GraphQLApi ApiId or ARN

type.description: Identifier of the Merged GraphQLApi to associate. It could be either GraphQLApi ApiId or ARN

properties.name: SourceApiIdentifier
properties.description: Identifier of the Source GraphQLApi to associate. It could be either GraphQLApi ApiId or ARN

type.description: Identifier of the Source GraphQLApi to associate. It could be either GraphQLApi ApiId or ARN

properties.name: LastSuccessfulMergeDate
properties.description: Date of last schema successful merge.

type.description: Date of last schema successful merge.

properties.name: MergedApiArn
properties.description: ARN of the Merged API in the association.

type.description: ARN of the Merged API in the association.

properties.name: MergedApiId
properties.description: GraphQLApiId of the Merged API in the association.

type.description: GraphQLApiId of the Merged API in the association.

properties.name: SourceApiArn
properties.description: ARN of the source API in the association.

type.description: ARN of the source API in the association.

properties.name: SourceApiId
properties.description: GraphQLApiId of the source API in the association.

type.description: GraphQLApiId of the source API in the association.
